name: Amrita Pritam
subtitle: ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ · अमृता प्रीतम
content: She was an Indian Novelist, essaayist and poet who wrote in punjabi and hindi. She is a prominent figure in Punjabi Litrature, she recived Shitya Akademi Award in year 1956. He body of work consist over 100 books of poetry, fiction, biography, essays and also written some pujabi folk songs
